## 📊 Progressive Use Cases

### 🟢 **EASY: "The Wrong Attachment Fix"**

_The problem everyone faces weekly_

| **The Scenario**                 | **Without mcp-pandoc**                                          | **With mcp-pandoc**                                 |
| -------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Job application needs PDF        | Open Word → Save As → Formatting breaks → Fix manually (15 min) | "Convert my resume to PDF" → Done (3 seconds)       |
| Client wants Word not Google Doc | Copy/paste → Reformat → Lost comments → Apologize (30 min)      | "Send as Word doc" → Perfect conversion (3 seconds) |
| Email needs plain text           | Strip formatting → Fix line breaks → Check spacing (10 min)     | "Make this plain text" → Ready to send (3 seconds)  |

**The Demo That Sells Itself:**

```
User: "The application only accepts PDFs"
AI:   "Converting your resume... Done! Here's your PDF"
Time: 3 seconds
Result: Perfect formatting, got the interview
```

**Social Media Hook:** _"Never lose an opportunity because of the wrong file format"_

### 🟡 **MEDIUM: "The Brand Consistency Engine"**

_Transform any text into professional, branded documents_

```
┌──────────────┐        ┌──────────────┐        ┌──────────────┐
│ Plain Text   │   -->  │  mcp-pandoc  │   -->  │  Branded     │
│ Markdown     │        │ + Reference  │        │  Document    │
│ Draft        │        │   Template   │        │  (Any Format)│
└──────────────┘        └──────────────┘        └──────────────┘

REAL EXAMPLE:
Input: Simple meeting notes in Markdown
Template: Company_Brand_Template.docx
Output: Professional proposal with:
• Company logo and colors
• Correct fonts and spacing
• Footer with confidentiality notice
• Automatic table of contents
Time: 5 seconds vs 45 minutes manual formatting
```

**Why This Matters:**

- Marketing teams: Consistent brand across all materials
- Sales teams: Professional proposals in seconds
- Consultants: Client-ready deliverables instantly

**ROI:** 5 hours/week saved on formatting = $15,000/year per employee

### 🟠 **HARD: "The Automated Publishing Pipeline"**

_Write once, publish everywhere_

| **Content Source**   | **Auto-Generated Outputs**                                                                                                                                                             | **Time Saved**       |
| -------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------- |
| Blog post (Markdown) | • LinkedIn Article (HTML)<br>• Medium post (Markdown variant)<br>• Email newsletter (responsive HTML)<br>• PDF download (branded)<br>• WordPress (HTML)<br>• Dev.to (with frontmatter) | 3 hours → 30 seconds |
| Technical docs       | • GitHub wiki (Markdown)<br>• Confluence (HTML)<br>• PDF manual<br>• EPUB for mobile<br>• Web docs (HTML)                                                                              | 2 hours → 20 seconds |
| Reports              | • Executive PDF<br>• Board deck (DOCX)<br>• Web dashboard (HTML)<br>• Archive (LaTeX)                                                                                                  | 4 hours → 1 minute   |

**Integration with No-Code Tools:**

```yaml
Zapier/n8n/Make Workflow:
trigger: New content in Notion/Google Docs
action_1: Extract content
action_2: Send to mcp-pandoc via AI
action_3: Generate all formats
action_4: Distribute to all channels
result: Complete automation, zero manual work
```

**Business Impact:**

- 5x content velocity
- 100% brand consistency
- Zero distribution friction

## 🚀 The Implementation Path

### Basic Integration

- Add mcp-pandoc to AI assistant
- Enable basic conversions (PDF, DOCX, Markdown)
- Measure: Format-related support tickets

### Templates & Branding

- Add reference document support
- Enable branded outputs
- Measure: User engagement increase

### Automation

- Connect to Zapier/n8n endpoints
- Enable workflow automation
- Measure: Premium upgrade rate

### Advanced Features

- Add Jupyter/LaTeX support
- Enable custom filters
- Measure: Enterprise adoption
